about: Innovative and impact-driven research scientist with over a decade of experience in Human-Computer Interaction (HCI), design methodologies, and conversational interfaces.

Proven track record of publishing influential work, securing patents, and leading interdisciplinary teams at IBM Research. Passionate about bridging academic rigor with industrial innovation to create user-centered technologies that scale.
Over 1k citations across top-tier HCI conferences and journals, designing trustworthy, inclusive UX for AI-driven systems.

education.Committee: Design for outdoor mobile multimedia: representation, content and interactivity for mobile tourist guides.

experience.title: Senior Research Scientist
bullets: Led pioneering research in conversational UX, chatbot design, and cognitive computing.
Collaborated with global teams on multi-party conversational systems and voice-based interfaces.
Co-inventor on multiple patents related to dynamic cognitive interfaces and blockchain-based energy management.
Published extensively in top-tier venues including CHI, CSCW, and IHC.
Mentored junior researchers and contributed to strategic initiatives at C4AI – University of São Paulo.
